004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj;
006
007public interface PneumaticsBase extends AutoCloseable {
008  /**
009   * Sets solenoids on a pneumatics module.
010   *
011   * @param mask mask
012   * @param values values
013   */
014  void setSolenoids(int mask, int values);
015
016  /**
017   * Gets solenoid values.
018   *
019   * @return values
020   */
021  int getSolenoids();
022
023  /**
024   * Get module number for this module.
025   *
026   * @return module number
027   */
028  int getModuleNumber();
029
030  /**
031   * Get the disabled solenoids.
032   *
033   * @return disabled list
034   */
035  int getSolenoidDisabledList();
036
037  /**
038   * Fire a single solenoid shot.
039   *
040   * @param index solenoid index
041   */
042  void fireOneShot(int index);
043
044  /**
045   * Set the duration for a single solenoid shot.
046   *
047   * @param index solenoid index
048   * @param durMs shot duration
049   */
050  void setOneShotDuration(int index, int durMs);
051
052  /**
053   * Check if a solenoid channel is valid.
054   *
055   * @param channel Channel to check
056   * @return True if channel exists
057   */
058  boolean checkSolenoidChannel(int channel);
059
060  /**
061   * Check to see if the masked solenoids can be reserved, and if not reserve them.
062   *
063   * @param mask The solenoid mask to reserve
064   * @return 0 if successful, mask of solenoids that couldn't be allocated otherwise
065   */
066  int checkAndReserveSolenoids(int mask);
067
068  /**
069   * Unreserve the masked solenoids.
070   *
071   * @param mask The solenoid mask to unreserve
072   */
073  void unreserveSolenoids(int mask);
074}
